title: Task Definition
description: Schema for validating task objects created by TaskCreate tool

subject.description: Brief title for the task in imperative form

description.description: Detailed description of what needs to be done

owner.description: Agent ID that owns/claimed this task

activeForm.description: Present continuous form shown in spinner (e.g., 'Running tests')

blockedBy.description: Task IDs that must complete before this task can start

blocks.description: Task IDs that are waiting on this task

metadata.description: Arbitrary metadata attached to the task

createdAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when task was created

updatedAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when task was last updated
